instructions: Back up data on the internal memory. From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Scroll to 'PERSONAL' and tap Backup & reset . Update the following as desired: Backup my data (on/off) Automatic restore (on/off) Tap Reset phone . If screen lock is enabled, enter screen unlock information to proceed. If desired, select Erase SD card . Tap OK . Review the Warning message and select either: CANCEL OK If you tap OK , the phone will perform a master reset.
From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Scroll to 'PERSONAL' and tap Backup & reset . Tap Network settings reset . Tap RESET SETTINGS > RESET SETTINGS .
